page.title: 11Blandford - Carnival
page.content: Every year in Blandford we have a Carnival & I have taken part in them nearly every time.It is special to me because it is only held once a year so when the time comes I am very excited because people give you balloons and sweets and it is fun to watch the floats.People dress up and pretend to be other people.Once I dressed up as a dwarf in Snow-White and the Seven Dwarfs. {Louise Webb.(aged 8) 6th July 1985 The Chief Scout came & cut our anniversary cake.Did you know that Scouting in Blandford is 75 years old? On Sunday 7th there was a pet show & disco.I entered the show with 'legomus parrotus' in the home-made section.I won 3rd prize,Craig won 2nd prize & Robin won 1st prize.Later on we had the disco I didn't dance, instead I went outside,played'1,2,3 In'then I had a Hot-Dog.{David}
